title: Pinball
content:
Trying to get hold of a font called Pinball but can’t find it any of the type librarys. If any one knows where you can get hold of it can you let me know, cheers.

 [‹ Going to USC Screening of Helvetica! Woo Hoo! Who's with me?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109073934/http:/typophile.com/node/33347 "Go to previous forum topic") [Animated GIF user icons ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109073934/http:/typophile.com/node/33245 "Go to next forum topic")
author: harry_ead

comments.content:
Trying to get hold of a fish called Pinball but can’t find it any of the five oceans.  
If any one knows where you can get hold of it can you let me know...  
Cheers+Flowers
Damn. I thought this was going to be a thread with pictures of typography on pinball machines. :(

Me too.

Although the fontbros ones do have a ceratin arcade sensibility...
